Key Match Events: Steph Curry scored 17 points, dished out 10 assists, and pulled down nine rebounds on 40% shooting.
Buddy Hield added 22 points off the bench for the Warriors.
Moses Moody, Trayce Jackson-Davis, and Jonathan Kuminga added 15, 14, and 10 points respectively.
Scoot Henderson led Portland with 22 points.
Post-Match Reflections: Steph Curry expressed that despite the offseason changes, the Warriors are still focused on chasing another championship.
Curry affirmed the team's championship ambitions despite the roster shakeup.
Others: The game marked the Warriors' first regular-season game without Klay Thompson since drafting him in 2011.
The Warriors are expected to execute another significant trade during the 2024-25 season to bolster their championship goal.
